intro: Psychotria birchiana, commonly known as the Birch's psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and small, white or pale yellow flowers. It typically grows as an epiphyte on trees in humid rainforest environments. Psychotria birchiana is notable for its potential ethnobotanical uses, though its medicinal properties remain under study.
